alert.note: Alert for Allen; East Cameron; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 1:42PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CAMERON...JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN EVANGELINE...WESTERN ACADIA AND SOUTHEASTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 230 PM CST... At 142 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinder to near Hayes to Creole. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Mamou, Welsh, Lake Arthur, Kinder, Basile, Iota, Elton, Mermentau, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Hayes, Grand Chenier, Klondike, Evangeline, Duralde, Pine Island, Thornwell, Lowry, Creole, and Bell City. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 48 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; East Cameron; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
